duck: Tackle (American football), a position in American football and Canadian football
Fishing tackle, the gear or equipment used when fishing
Tackle (football move), a play in various forms of football
Block and tackle, a system of two or more pulleys with a rope or cable threaded between them, usually used to lift or pull heavy loads
Sliding tackle, a tackle in association football
tackle definition: a set of the equipment used in a particular activity.
Dump tackle, forceful move in rugby of picking up an opposing player and throwing him to the ground

wiki.text:
'Tackle' may refer to:

* In football: ** Tackle (football move), a play in various forms of football **
  Tackle (American football), a position in American football and Canadian
  football ** Dump tackle, forceful move in rugby of picking up an opposing
  player and throwing him to the ground ** The Tackle, a term for the final play
  of Super Bowl XXXIV ** Sliding tackle, a tackle in association football
* Block and tackle, a system of two or more pulleys with a rope or cable
  threaded between them, usually used to lift or pull heavy loads
* Fishing tackle, the gear or equipment used when fishing
* Electro-Wave Human Tackle, a character from [[Kamen Rider Stronger]].
* Tackle (Transformers) - a fictional character.
wiki.title: Tackle
